SiteSettings.name: SiteSettings
SiteSettings.label: Site Settings
SiteSettings.description: Represents SiteSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableProxyLoginICHeader.description: enable Proxy Login I C Header field of SiteSettings metadata component.

enableTopicsInSites.description: enable Topics In Sites field of SiteSettings metadata component.

enableVisualforceApiAccessAllowed.description: enable Visualforce Api Access Allowed field of SiteSettings metadata component.
